lore: The existence of the Nihilists is believed to be linked to that of the Voidlords. In fact, there are those who think these creatures exist only to end them.\n\nWhen a Nihilist Protector places its hand on its book and chants, all creatures within a mile of it are shielded from the Voidlords' powers for thirty-six days.
menagerieDialog: (It's busy performing a fast-paced dance for the entertainment of your other creatures.)
(This creature always seems to be dancing. Its beauty and grace are truly captivating.)
(Despite its limitless grace and beauty, you can't help but feel a sense of unease around this creature. There seems to be a presence of darkness living within it.)
(Though this creature cannot speak, it seems to be able to communicate with you via its complex and varied dances.)
(Your other creatures seem to be a bit more chipper with this creature around, but you can't help but think it has ulterior motives.)
name: Nihilist Protector
